about_the_game:
Come Help & Save John!


Step into Rousty Town, a hilarious shantytown where even the rooftops seem to have a sense of humor! Join Grandpa Johny (John), our beloved barista mastering the art of coffee for 32 years, but whose café is on strike. His espresso machine has kicked the bucket, and it's up to you to help get his establishment back on track.

Prepare for an unforgettable adventure in a setting more colorful than a parrot on LSD. Explore every nook of this zany city and meet characters as endearing as they are improbable. Climb, jump, and outwit the traps of this Low Poly world with Steve, your guide with a radiant smile and questionable jokes.

Buckle up (or wear suspenders, it's safer) and embark on a journey through Rousty Town, where every street corner holds a surprise and laughter is your best weapon. Ready to become the hero Grandpa Johny and the whole crazy town need?



Strange Gameplay...?


Dive into the wacky universe of our new game SideScroller, where you'll embody hilarious characters who've never heard the word "boredom". Brace yourself for ridiculous stunts and ludicrous situations with physics as unpredictable as they are entertaining.

Imagine leaping, sliding, and crashing in epic fashion, all while trying not to burst into laughter. Each level offers a new farcical adventure, filled with hilarious challenges and unexpected surprises. Your characters never stay still, and their grotesque acrobatics will leave you amazed.

Ready to embark on this comedic journey where every fall is funnier than the last?

Features & Other Content:


    • Eye-catching Low Poly graphics that look sharp while keeping things light-hearted
    • A deluge of colors and laughter guaranteed, with physics that will make even gravity grimace
    • Unlockable characters with outfits as wacky as your acrobatic skills
    • Adventure mode that plunges you into a story as epic as it is chaotic, where each level holds unpredictable surprises

Dive into Just Climb: where the fun is turbocharged and even the pixels are laughing!
detailed_description:
Wishlist Now



Every addition to your wishlist counts! Support our project strongly with just one click, it's free and invaluable to us.

name: Just Climb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce GT 330M, Radeon HD 4670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5830 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Dive into Just Climb! With its wacky characters, hilarious challenges, and an adventure full of surprises at every turn, get ready to experience unforgettable and zany moments!
